channel.title: Dave Winer
channel.description: I create new media types for fun. Developer of outliners, blogging tools, RSS aggregators, podcasting.

item.description: 2003: How to name a product.

source:outline.text: 2003: How to name a product.

item.description: PublicFolder is an app I put together after Dropbox stopped supporting a public folder. It's too important a feature to live without.

source:outline.text: PublicFolder is an app I put together after Dropbox stopped supporting a public folder. It's too important a feature to live without.

item.description: Are the Never Trumpers Democrats Now?

source:outline.text: Are the Never Trumpers Democrats Now?

item.description: PublicFolder is a Mac desktop app that keeps an S3 location in sync with a folder on a local disk. It's also available as a Node package you can run on its own or embed in your own apps.

source:outline.text: PublicFolder is a Mac desktop app that keeps an S3 location in sync with a folder on a local disk. It's also available as a Node package you can run on its own or embed in your own apps.

item.description: I want to understand the extended Markdown some outliners use. If you use one of them, you can help.

source:outline.text: I want to understand the extended Markdown some outliners use. If you use one of them, you can help.

item.description: If you get a chance to buy Bread Alone's Fruit & Nut Sourdough go for it. It's so delicious and filling. You could live off it. Well you should eat some salad or vegetables. But this is soul food par excellence.

source:outline.text: If you get a chance to buy Bread Alone's Fruit & Nut Sourdough go for it. It's so delicious and filling. You could live off it. Well you should eat some salad or vegetables. But this is soul food par excellence.

item.description: Republicans never had a COVID plan. They just wanted us to accept mass death.

source:outline.text: Republicans never had a COVID plan. They just wanted us to accept mass death.

item.description: The Latest COVID Surge Is Just the Start of a New Nightmare.

source:outline.text: The Latest COVID Surge Is Just the Start of a New Nightmare.

item.description: Some of the most iconic 9/11 news coverage is lost. Blame the people who thought they owned the web and forced the end of Adobe Flash.

source:outline.text: Some of the most iconic 9/11 news coverage is lost. Blame the people who thought they owned the web and forced the end of Adobe Flash.

item.description: The Chattanooga Times Free Press in Tennessee says it will give iPads to daily print subscribers as it goes digital-only six days a week by mid-2022.

source:outline.text: The Chattanooga Times Free Press in Tennessee says it will give iPads to daily print subscribers as it goes digital-only six days a week by mid-2022.

item.description: Stephen Waters is having trouble with Radio3's bookmarklet in Firefox. I don't use Firefox, so can't help debug this.

source:outline.text: Stephen Waters is having trouble with Radio3's bookmarklet in Firefox. I don't use Firefox, so can't help debug this.

item.description: Dan Rather produced the first broadcast of live radar images showing a hurricane.

source:outline.text: Dan Rather produced the first broadcast of live radar images showing a hurricane.

item.description: If you live in California please vote for Gavin Newsom in the election on Tuesday.

item.description: Alabama man dies after 43 hospitals with full ICUs turn him away.

item.title: Blind your eyes and plug your ears! Here come the 9/11 anniversary stories!
item.description: “The anniversary story is, in almost all instances, a media scam designed to exploit audiences by reviving memories—usually painful ones—to sell newspapers or boost ratings.”

source:outline.text: Blind your eyes and plug your ears! Here come the 9/11 anniversary stories!

item.description: “Google’s delay in phasing out third-party cookies until the end of 2023 offers a temporary relief to news publishers, but many still need to find alternatives.”

source:outline.text: “Google’s delay in phasing out third-party cookies until the end of 2023 offers a temporary relief to news publishers, but many still need to find alternatives.”
